Tony Dungy served as a confidant for Michael Vick when he signed with the Eagles. He spoke to Michael Vick recently and said the Eagles' free agent quarterback wants to return to Philadelphia next season. He is very grateful to Jeffrey Lurie and Andy Reid for believing in him and giving him an opportunity, Tony Dungy told me.
